note.p: Master printer and accountant. Lived in St Pancras, London. Interested in entomology.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/237/83/11), 1881 (RG11/384/54/35), 1891 (RG12/617/36/13)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 February 2019)
Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales: list of members 1910
